00021 #include "calvin_files/converters/chp/comparer/CHPComparer.h"
00022 //
00023 #include "calvin_files/converters/chp/comparer/CHPCompareCalvintoCalvin.h"
00024 #include "calvin_files/converters/chp/comparer/CHPCompareGCOStoCalvin.h"
00025 #include "calvin_files/converters/chp/comparer/CHPCompareGCOStoGCOS.h"
00026 #include "calvin_files/converters/chp/src/CHPFileVersion.h"
00027 //
00028 #include <cmath>
00029 //
00030 
00031 using namespace affymetrix_comparer;
00032 using namespace affymetrix_chp_converter;
00033 using namespace std;
00034 
00035 
00036 /*
00037  * Clear the members.
00038  */
00039 void CHPComparer::Clear()
00040 {
00041         differences = "";
00042 }
00043 
00044 /*
00045  * Compare the versions.
00046  */
00047 bool CHPComparer::CompareFiles(const char *file1, const char *file2)
00048 {
00049         bool status=false;
00050 
00051         CHPFileVersionType ver1 = CHPFileVersion::DetermineCHPFileVersion(file1);
00052         CHPFileVersionType ver2 = CHPFileVersion::DetermineCHPFileVersion(file2);
00053 
00054         // GCOS to Calvin comparison.
00055         if (((ver1 == GCOS_XDA_Version || ver1 == GCOS_Mas5_Version) && ver2 == Calvin_Version1) ||
00056                 (ver1 == Calvin_Version1 && (ver2 == GCOS_XDA_Version || ver2 == GCOS_Mas5_Version)))
00057         {
00058                 const char *gcosFile = (ver1 == GCOS_XDA_Version ? file1 : file2 );
00059                 const char *calvinFile = (ver1 == Calvin_Version1 ? file1 : file2 );
00060                 CHPCompareGCOStoCalvin compare;
00061                 status = compare.CompareFiles(gcosFile, calvinFile);
00062                 differences = compare.Differences();
00063         }
00064 
00065         // GCOS to GCOS comparison.
00066         else if ((ver1 == GCOS_XDA_Version || ver1 == GCOS_Mas5_Version) && (ver2 == GCOS_XDA_Version || ver2 == GCOS_Mas5_Version))
00067         {
00068                 CHPCompareGCOStoGCOS compare;
00069                 status = compare.CompareFiles(file1, file2);
00070                 differences = compare.Differences();
00071         }
00072 
00073         // Calvin to Calvin comparison.
00074         else if (ver1 == Calvin_Version1 && ver2 == Calvin_Version1)
00075         {
00076                 CHPCompareCalvintoCalvin compare;
00077                 status = compare.CompareFiles(file1, file2);
00078                 differences = compare.Differences();
00079         }
00080         else
00081         {
00082                 differences = "file comparisons not supported.";
00083                 status = false;
00084         }
00085 
00086         return status;
00087 }
